body_html:
I can confirm the problem still exists in TF version 1.2.0. Saving and restoring model with LSTMCell and dynamic_rnn in Python 3 gives random weights. After switching to Python 2 all works fine.

Solving it for TensorFlow will also make it work for Keras (using TF as backend). Actually I've rewritten my model from Keras to TF after having problems with Keras model.save(). Turns out that it's TF that is the problem.

Does anyone know how to make it work in Python 3?

body:
I can confirm the problem still exists in TF version 1.2.0. Saving and restoring model with LSTMCell and dynamic_rnn in Python 3 gives random weights. After switching to Python 2 all works fine.

Solving it for TensorFlow will also make it work for Keras (using TF as backend). Actually I've rewritten my model from Keras to TF after having problems with Keras model.save(). Turns out that it's TF that is the problem.

Does anyone know how to make it work in Python 3?
